title: How to Have a Super Fun Bachelorette Weekend in Key West
short_description: Congratulations! You're getting married and now planning a weekend getaway with your besties to celebrate. We know how important it is to you that you and your friends see as much possible during your stay. Hence, we put together some super fun things to do and see during your bachelorette weekend in Key West.
more_content:
Congratulations! You're getting married and now planning a weekend getaway with your besties to celebrate. We know how important it is to you that you and your friends see as much possible during your stay. Hence, we put together some super fun things to do and see during your bachelorette weekend in Key West.

Let’s Go To Brunch

Photo Credit: Bagatelle Restaurant

Bagatelle Restaurant is located at 115 Duval Street, close to Mallory Square. It is situated in a historic, architecturally-beautiful building, built in the 1800s, that was converted into a restaurant in 1979. This is the place you'll want to sit and enjoy great food and conversation while people-watching in paradise. They've set the brunch scene with your besties.

Best Brunch in Key West!!! Great atmosphere! Beautiful building! Great staff!" ~ Christopher Cory, Recommends Bagatelle Restaurant on Facebook.

A few of our favorite brunch dishes at Bagatelle Restaurant are the Lobster Benedict, Surf & Turf Benedict, Biscuits and Gravy (a must-try) and the Bananas Foster or the Crispy French Toast! Once again, way too many to favorites. Visit and enjoy the Bagatelle Brunch experience and make sure to come back and tell us all about it.

View the Bagatelle Brunch Menu

Bagatelle
115 Duval Street, Key West, Florida | 305-296-6609
HOURS:
Open 9 am - Midnight | Brunch, Dinner and Late Night
Brunch is served 7 Days A Week from 9 am - 4 pm

See A Drag Show

Reality is a drag, so while in Key West, make sure to see a Drag Show at Aqua Bar and Key West Nightclub. There are shows seven nights a week and trust us, it will be a night you won't forget ...too much fun!

I can not thank Aqua enough for the great show and accommodating a party of 30. It was a great start to my wedding weekend, and my guests raved about it. You must stop when in Key West! — Emily Lewis, Facebook Review

AQUA Bar and Key West Nightclub is located at 711 Duval St, Key West, FL 33040.

Spend a Day on the Water

You've got to plan one day of fun, sun, and adventure at sea, and we know just how to do that. Book the Fury's Ultimate Adventure and get ready for a full day of action-packed, adrenaline-pumping watersports. There will be lots of adventures to take part in, including snorkeling the reef, parasail, jet ski, and even gliding down the water park slide. This full-day excursion is perfect for groups wishing to spend a day out on the water with lots of watersports activities.

The Ultimate Adventure Trip Features:

  • Sail on a State-of-the-Art Catamaran
  • Snorkel North America's Only Living Coral Reef
  • Parasail
  • Jet Ski (Double Rider)
  • Only State Certified Water Park that includes: Water Toys, Action Climbing Tower, Aqua Slide & Water Trampoline

Learn more about Fury Water Adventures: Ultimate Adventure

Go on a Scavenger Hunt

This is one of our favorite group events and things to do. It combines clues and riddles, highlighting Key West's unique character and allows your friends to meet, mix, and mingle in a fun and lively atmosphere.

I just did this scavenger for a bachelorette party, and it was a blast! It allowed us to jump around and check out a lot of different bars, all while looking for various clues along the way. Casey and Mark were awesome to work with (both with helping me coordinate the details of the event and orchestrating it when we arrived). Very flexible and helpful! I would definitely recommend this for a fun group activity! ~ Ashley Nicole, Facebook Review

The Southernmost Scavenger Hunt can be customized for any event. If you are on a girl's getaway, guys getaway, birthday or bachelorette, family reunion, corporate retreat, or wedding celebration, add this to your Key West itinerary.

Learn More about Southernmost Scavenger Hunt

Go Shopping

Vignette Key West

Located on Southard Street between Duval and Simonton Streets is where you'll find this hidden gem and unique Key West shopping experience. Vignette is a Key West Boutique for Women. A curated collection of clothing and accessories dedicated to you ...we all have our own story to tell. Portray who you are by wearing your own style. Be the most YOU! That is what Vignette is all about so when you visit, grab your friends and go shopping there. You won't be disappointed.

Gorgeous store with an eclectic merchandise mix of artisanal clothing and Chan Lu jewelry.. personable and friendly sales... a fabulous experience.. off the tourist drag, a lovely respite! ~ Caterina Giglio, Facebook Review

Vignette Key West
526 Southard Street, Key West, Florida 33040
305-916-5722
Hours: Open 10 am to 6 pm

Private Poolside Dinner

Why not close out the weekend with a private dinner at the Serenity Pool. This is the time to come together in an intimate setting. We'll make sure to set the scene as you share one last bachelorette weekend dinner with your besties at The Marker.

It's not that diamonds are a girl's best friend, but it's your best friends who are your diamonds.~ Gina Barreca

We know there is so much to see and do across the island but the list above will definitely give you and your friends some laughs, love, new experiences and memories to share forever. Congrats again and cheers to your besties! #lovethemarker
